name: Anitube Guardian
description:
Anitube guardian simulates the experience of being the chat moderator for a popular VTuber. Ban the negative comments and highlight the positive ones.

You can play the game in browser, but I would recommend playing the free, downloadable version.

The paid version, "Anitube guardian+" features three new costumes. Other than that it's identical to the regular version. It's really more like a donation that gets you a small prize, rather than a paid game.
